name: DnD Dice Picker [Download]
description:
DnD Dice Picker* is a small project that allows people to have their own DnD Dice roller application! Built for Windows, MacOS as well as Android, this app is great for those who want a basic dice roller that is available to them on a variety of platforms. 

System Requirements

Windows

  • 2 Core CPU or Better
  • 4GB RAM or Better
  • Dedicated or Integrated Graphics
  • 1GB Storage
  • Windows 10 or 11

MacOS

  • All 2015 Macs and above running macOS Monterey or Higher

Android

  • All Android phones with Android 8.0 and Higher**

**Android phones with a lower version OS may also run the application. Requirements are based on internal testing.

Internal Testing

DnD Dice Picker was developed and testing using systems with the following configurations:

MacOS

  • M1 Pro (10C CPU and 16C GPU)
  • 32GB RAM

Android (Virtualised through Android Studio for MacOS)

  • Emulated Pixel 3a running API Level 33 (Android 13)

*DnD Dice Picker is currently in development in the 'Alpha' stage. Current builds do not depict the final aesthetic of the game. Functional updates may be introduced at a later stage of development.
